SEARCH
Package hwSystem.Protocols

Class OneWire

java.lang.Object
hwSystem.Protocols.OneWire
All Implemented Interfaces:
Protocol
public class OneWire extends Object implements Protocol
Represents the OneWire communication protocol. Used for simple, low-speed communication with devices like temperature sensors.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a OneWire protocol instance and initializes the log stack.
